title.rendered: Ogot Bar Stool – internal steel structure – Various Backrest Designs – MOQ 6

content.rendered:
*This item has a minimum order quantity of 6*

The Ogot Bar Stool is a modern stool, with beautiful curves and undulations. The Ogot comes with the option of having a plain backrest or a cut out backrest!

Made with a solid steel internal leg structure for total support, stability and longevity; surrounded by a beech frame.

The Ogot can be upholstered in any material (Customers Own Material, also known as COM), but comes as standard in a wide selection of faux leathers, included in the price!

We work closely with a number of fabric & faux leather mills as well as leather dealers so you can customise your chair to suit you (COM):

– Click here to browse Abitex Fabric & Faux Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Sunbury Design’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Panaz’s Fabric and Faux Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Crest JMT Leather’s range of leathers to suit all budgets!

We charge to upholster your chair in custom fabrics, fauxs or leathers, we only charge you what the material costs us, plus a small handling fee; which is included in the total price. If you prefer, you can purchase the material yourself and arrange for it to be delivered to our warehouse.

Approx LM required per chair: 1.5LM of a plain fabric.

2 year structural warranty. Made in Europe.
